main event: A civilian observer witnessed an unidentified object moving across the sky while they were watching television.
interesting points: The observer first saw the object through the window before going outside to get a closer look., The object was described as an orange-red glowing sphere approximately 2 feet in diameter., It was seen moving slowly and silently across the sky for about 2-3 minutes., The estimated altitude of the object was between 500 to 1000 feet., The observer was certain it was not an airplane or helicopter.
sighted object: orange-red glowing object, round in shape
witness description: a 38-year-old male with average vision and in good physical condition
